Sumpter House
21802 Clark Road
Belleville, MI 48111-8300
Re: License #: CI820308026
2023 Interim Inspection Report
Dear Tajuanda Carey:
Attached is the Interim Inspection Report for the above referenced agency completed on
09/19/2023. The inspection has determined substantial compliance with applicable
licensing statutes and rules.
Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and contact me with any
questions. In the event that I am not available and you need to speak to someone
immediately, please contact Linda Tansil, area manager, at 248-860-0787.
Sincerely,
Vivian D Malleck, Licensing Consultant
enclosure
P.O. BOX 30650 • LANSING, MICHIGAN 48909
www.michigan.gov • (517) 335-1980

III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS
The agency is in compliance with all applicable rules and statutes.
IV. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
The agency was offered technical assistance in the following areas: None at this time.
V. CONSULTATION
The agency was offered consultation in the following areas: Requested Sumpter House
policy and procedure for their mental health stabilization program be submitted by
10/11/2023 for a tentative opening date on 11/15/2023.
2

VI. EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD
Maltreatment in Care
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this licensing
period.
Corrective Action Plan Compliance
The agency was not required to submit any corrective action plans during this
period under review.
Financial Overview
Sumpter House is operated under Spectrum Human Services. Spectrum Human
Service Inc. is a 501(c)3. Their financial audit was reviewed and found fiscally
sound.
PREA compliance (if applicable)
Sumpter House does not have youths in care at this time.
Chief Administrator Assessment
Chief administrator assessment was received and reviewed on 09/19/2023.
Assessment states Sumpter House is projected to reopen on 11/15/2023. Sumpter
House will be reopened for 6 male youths, ages 14 to 17 years old, with a mental
health stabilization program.
Staff and Youth Interviews
Sumpter House does not have staff at this time.
Sumpter House does not have youths in care at this time.
Description of Agency Walk Through
Sumpter House is furnished and maintained for reopening.
3

VII. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the agency is in compliance with all applicable licensing
statutes and rules. It is recommended that the agency continue on their regular license.
09/20/2023
